mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_postscript (site_postscript_rownum, username, site, category, comment, health, inoutside, cost, writetime, hitnum, likenum, route_code) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, #{site}, #{category}, #{comment}, #{health}, #{inoutside}, #{cost}, to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 0, 0, #{route_code})
mapper.select: SELECT *, IF((site_postscript_rownum in (SELECT site_postscript_rownum FROM site_postscript_like WHERE username = #{param1}) ),'true','false') as 'site_like' FROM site_postscript
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_postscript_like (site_postscript_like_rownum, username, site_postscript_rownum) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, #{site_postscript_rownum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM site_postscript_like WHERE username = #{username} AND site_postscript_rownum = #{site_postscript_rownum}
DELETE FROM FROM site_postscript_tag WHERE site_postscript_rownum = ${site_postscript_rownum}
